definition: to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
